webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.nav module¶

class webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.nav.NavObject(driver)[source]¶

Bases: webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.base.BasePage

Page object prototype for navbars

Variables:
  • NavObject.LINK_MAP – Maps link text to a tuple containing its locator and the page object class for the target page, modal, section, etc (or None if need be). Override in subclasses
  • NavObject.HOVER_MAP – Maps link text to a tuple containing its locator and the page object class for the menu, dropdown, etc that should appear on hover (or None if need be). Override in subclasses
  • NavObject.FIXED – (Default = True) True if element is a fixed navbar, False otherwise. If set to False in a subclass, click_page_link() and hover_over_page_link() will scroll the target link into view before interacting with it
LINK_MAP = {}¶
HOVER_MAP = {}¶
FIXED = True¶
click_page_link(link_map_key)[source]¶

Click one of the page links and return a page object class for the link target

Parameters:link_map_key – Key into LINK_MAP for the link to click on
Returns:Corresponding page object class for the link target (if applicable)
hover_over_page_link(link_map_key)[source]¶

Hover mouse over one of the page links

Parameters:link_map_key – Key into HOVER_MAP for the link to hover mouse over
Returns:Corresponding page object class for the hover dropdown/container/etc (if applicable)
class webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.nav.CollapsibleNavObject(driver)[source]¶

Bases: webdriver_test_tools.pageobject.nav.NavObject

Subclass of NavObject with additional methods for collapsible nav menus

In addition to the variables for NavObject, the following variables need to be defined for collapsible navs

Variables:
  • CollapsibleNavObject.EXPAND_BUTTON_LOCATOR – Locator for the button that expands the nav menu
  • CollapsibleNavObject.COLLAPSE_BUTTON_LOCATOR – Locator for the button that expands the nav menu
  • CollapsibleNavObject.MENU_CONTAINER_LOCATOR – Locator for the collapsing/expanding container of the navigation menu
EXPAND_BUTTON_LOCATOR = None¶
COLLAPSE_BUTTON_LOCATOR = None¶
MENU_CONTAINER_LOCATOR = None¶
is_expanded()[source]¶

Check if the nav menu is expanded

This method checks if the element located by MENU_CONTAINER_LOCATOR exists and is visible. This should be sufficient for many common implementations of collapsible navs, but can be overridden if this isn’t a reliable detection method for an implementation

Returns:True if the nav menu is expanded, False if it’s collapsed
click_expand_button()[source]¶

Click the button to expand the nav menu

click_collapse_button()[source]¶

Click the button to collapse the nav menu
